resolution.description: Issues which have gone without any activity for an extended period of time
resolution.name: Abandoned

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

worklogs.comment:
kou opened a new pull request, #14431:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14431

   https://app.travis-ci.com/github/ursacomputing/crossbow/builds/256719193#L8074 failed with:
   
       curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 422
   
   It's helpful if we get more details on error.

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14431#issuecomment-1280132705

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

fields.summary: [Dev][Archery][Crossbow] Show body from server on upload error

comments.body: We need newer curl for {{--fail-with-body}}. It's difficult to use on CI for now.
